subject: Issuance of completion certificate or Provisional Completion Certificate in respect of PPP Projects.
text: HTd4 7r4 TToTHf  gifeahut TYM Pnore 91-11-25074100/25074200 (87 9Far| trrt #A) #R Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry ot Road Transport and Highways) 0-5 Vi 6, 842(-10, Ertt; T Ro7h-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-tO, Dwarka New Delhi-110075 No: NHAVCGM(CMCY2015/36 22.05.2015 AII CGNGM(T) NHAI-HQ Sub: Issuance of Completion Certificate or Provisional Completion Certificate in respect of PPP Projects Sir , Please refer to this office letter of even nO_ dated 24.04.2015 vide which Technical Divisions were requested to issue the letter enclosed with ibid, letter to all IEs under their jurisdiction This enclosed letter also contained a checklist/ guidelines as Annex-I. 2 M/s NHBF has represented on the issue and after deliberation; EC has decided to amend para 5 of the checklist / 'guidelines enclosed with the letter. Accordingly, all Technical Divisions are requested to issue the enclosed letter to the IEs appointed for PPP Frojects under their jurisdiction 3 This has the approval of Competent Authority. Encl: As above Alsk AaF (Alok Deefankar) Chief General Manger Copy to: 1 PS to Chairman, NHAI 2, PS t0 Member (PPP) 3. PS to Member (Fin Admn-) 4. PS to Member (Tech) 5, PS to CVO, NHAI AII ROs and PDs For information and necessary action please. To;
